name: FastBots
description: FastBots.ai is a no-code platform for creating AI-powered chatbots trained on custom business data to provide 24/7 customer support and automation.
longDescription: FastBots.ai is an intuitive, no-code platform designed to help businesses and individuals create AI-powered chatbots tailored to their specific needs. By leveraging advanced large language models like GPT-4o and Claude, it enables users to train chatbots using diverse data sources such as websites, PDFs, and YouTube videos. The platform aims to enhance customer service, streamline operations, and boost engagement by automating responses and tasks. It supports seamless integration with websites and social media channels, offering multilingual support and real-time human handover for complex queries. FastBots.ai empowers users to deliver personalized, efficient customer experiences without requiring coding expertise, making it accessible for businesses of all sizes.
features: No-code chatbot creation allows users to build AI chatbots in under two minutes without programming skills.
Custom data training enables chatbots to learn from websites, PDFs, DOCX, TXT files, and YouTube videos for accurate responses.
Multilingual support ensures chatbots can communicate in multiple languages to serve a global audience.
Zapier integration connects chatbots to over 8,000 apps for automated tasks like sending emails or booking appointments.
Live chat handover feature allows human agents to take over conversations when AI cannot resolve queries.
Customizable appearance lets users tailor chatbot design, including welcome messages, avatars, and color schemes, to match their brand.
Lead generation tools enable chatbots to collect contact details and integrate with CRM systems for seamless lead management.
Built-in analytics provide insights into chatbot interactions, helping users optimize performance and user experience.
Automated retraining ensures chatbots stay updated by revisiting webpages for changes.
Social media integrations allow chatbots to handle customer queries on platforms like Instagram, WhatsApp, and Slack.

faqs.question: What is FastBots.ai used for?
faqs.answer: FastBots.ai is used to create AI-powered chatbots that automate customer support, sales assistance, and lead generation for websites and social media.

faqs.question: Do I need coding skills to use FastBots.ai?
faqs.answer: No, FastBots.ai is a no-code platform, allowing users to create and customize chatbots with a user-friendly interface.

faqs.question: Can FastBots.ai chatbots handle multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, FastBots.ai chatbots support multiple languages, enabling businesses to engage with a diverse global audience.

faqs.question: What types of data can I use to train my chatbot?
faqs.answer: You can train your chatbot with data from websites, PDFs, DOCX, TXT files, and YouTube videos, ensuring relevant and accurate responses.

faqs.question: Does FastBots.ai offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, FastBots.ai provides a free plan with up to 50 messages per month, ideal for testing or small-scale use.

faqs.question: Can I integrate FastBots.ai with other tools?
faqs.answer: FastBots.ai integrates with over 8,000 apps via Zapier, plus native integrations with platforms like WhatsApp, Instagram, and Slack.

faqs.question: How secure is the data handled by FastBots.ai?
faqs.answer: FastBots.ai adheres to strict security protocols, including SOC2 and GDPR compliance, to protect customer data.

faqs.question: Can human agents take over from the chatbot?
faqs.answer: Yes, the live chat handover feature allows human agents to step in when the AI cannot answer a query.
